::KitKat::

She looked at Testifier. She glared at him. "GO INSIDE THE BASE 
BEFORE THEY KILL YOU!" She could barely feel the rifle under her 
chin.  She felt her strength ebb away slowly.  It was getting herd 
for her to stand up even. She sighed,"I"ll tell you everything if you 
go inside and just wait."

She raised her rifle and fired again at the maximals.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> "No! What did you do with her!?" Testifier yelled, tucking the rifle
> underneath her chin...
